title: Is Aatrox gonna ever have his revival voicelines added back?
body: Aatrox's voicelines when he died and revived with his ult were some of the best ones so when they removed them I was pretty sad. Riot could reimplement them in other ways such as when Aatrox is on critical health or when he procs GA. These are just thoughts.

replies.body: Hi there! They should currently be hooked up to Aatrox proc-ing GA. Let me know if you're unable to get them to trigger.
I'm glad these were added back! They added so much to Aatrox's personality.

If they give him his blood well mechanic back since new Aatrox is resource-less anyways but make it based on landing Qs while ulted then they can bring the revive back. That would solve the problem of Aatroxs' revive being to reliable and safe in competitive and give him some strength in solo queue where picking him right now over other bruisers is just stupid unless you are god tier at him and they could bring the mechanic back and make Boris more like Aatrox.

But y'know.... balance team we're talking about here.
